level.text: DCHA issues invitations to owners as needed to make dwelling units available for leasing by eligible families in accordance with the Equal Opportunity Housing Plan. DCHA welcomes the continuous participation of owners of decent, safe, and sanitary housing units.

4909.2 DCHA shall maintain a list of interested owners and their properties which are available for HCVP. As inquiries from prospective new owners are received, program staff records the necessary information on units and shall make such information available to prospective participants upon request.
Owner meetings with HCVP staff shall be held periodically to maintain a positive relationship and to provide owners further knowledge regarding Program rules and operations.
